examples.example: 在那美丽的黄昏下，他勇敢地向心爱的女孩表白了自己的爱意。

translate.english: Under that beautiful dusk, he bravely confessed his love to the beloved girl.

examples.example: 他决定在这个特殊的日子向她表白，倾诉自己内心的真情实意。

translate.english: He decided to confess to her on this special day and pour out his true feelings in his heart.

examples.example: 他终于鼓起勇气，在聚会上向她深情地表白。

translate.english: He finally summoned up the courage and confessed his deep love to her at the party.
